banner.title: DIGITAL ARTIST,
banner.description: I've been fortunate enough to help many businesses and international clients to produce professional marketing materials and webpages. I am consistently learning and expanding my skills so that I can provide the best value to my clients.

about.title: WHAT I'M GOOD AT
about.description: I have studied photography and web development over many years. With my professional experience I hope to provide new beauty on the web. I feel that the customer experience is paramount and believe in following design standards while creating completely unique work.
about.about: With the help of my web development services you can receive highly responsive web designs which are compatible with all of today's mobile devices. Using JavaScript to impletment custom integrations and check out systems, I will build you a website unique to your needs.

skills.title: WHAT I'M GOOD AT
skills.description: I have studied photography and web development over many years. With my professional experience I hope to provide new beauty on the web. I feel that the customer experience is paramount and believe in following design standards while creating completely unique work.
skills.about: With the help of my web development services you can receive highly responsive web designs which are compatible with all of today's mobile devices. Using JavaScript to impletment custom integrations and check out systems, I will build you a website unique to your needs.

In the past I have worked to direct full-scale video productions as well as build marketing videos for brands on the web. Using top capture and sound devices, I can work with you to build a high definition marketing video that will suit the needs of your business.

I can organize sets, brainstorm new concepts, as well as capture product photos. My high-quality photography resources can beautify your webspace. With some of the best photography equipment and software on the market today you can get a professional advantage.

With the help of top software I can create stunning vector graphics for use in print media, branding, forums and online sources. I've done graphic design work for logos, restaurant menus, web site modernization, and even screen prints on clothing.

portfolio.title: WORK I'VE DONE
portfolio.description: Please have a look at my portfolio items to learn more about the type of work that I have done in the past. I am pleased to have worked with these professional clients and I will offer the same level of dedication for your project as well.

work.title: WORK I'VE DONE
work.description: Please have a look at my portfolio items to learn more about the type of work that I have done in the past. I am pleased to have worked with these professional clients and I will offer the same level of dedication for your project as well.

subscribe.title: SUBSCRIBE FOR UPDATES
subscribe.description: Feel free to subscribe to my e-mail list for ongoing updates about where I'm working and traveling to next. I work to keep all of my clients and friends updated with some of my newest projects, equipment, and adventures. This way you can always know about new promotions and services that I have to offer.

blog.title: LATEST BLOG
blog.description: Stay tuned to find out what I have been up to lately. In my blogs I share information about my professional career as well as some of my travel photography. I will also share some top tips for aspiring photographers and graphic designers on my blog.
blog.blogAbout: Holi is a spring festival regularly held in India and Nepal. The idea of Holi is to share colors as well as love amongst people. I have always been fascinated by this beautiful festival and decided a travel to a more local celebration in Spanish Fork Utah!

There were 55 homes housing over 110 workers at the peak of the mine and today it's quite eerie to see this area completely unoccupied. I took my camera out to try and capture some of the abandoned foundations and homes.

footer.title: GET IN TOUCH
footer.description: If you need to request specific work or if you are interested in learning more about one of my portfolio items, please feel free to contact me. Over the years as a professional digital arist I have expand my skills to deliver more for each one of my clients. I would love to help out your business or personal cause with my services.
footer.message: An artist is a person who performs certain things skillfully, but doesn’t really know how he does it. You learn art by methods that you don’t know how you learnt because it's much too subtle to be translated into words.
